statements: SELECT feedback_id, player_id, feedback_text, rating, timestamp FROM player_feedback;
SELECT player_id, feedback_text, rating FROM player_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_id, timestamp FROM player_feedback WHERE player_id = 1001;
SELECT player_id, feedback_text FROM player_feedback WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT feedback_id, player_id, feedback_text, rating FROM player_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_feedback WHERE player_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, rating FROM player_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS num_feedbacks FROM player_feedback GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM player_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT player_id, MAX(rating) AS highest_rating FROM player_feedback GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY highest_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT player_id, feedback_text FROM player_feedback WHERE player_id = 123 ORDER BY feedback_text ASC;
SELECT review_id, game_id, rating FROM game_reviews WHERE rating < 4 ORDER BY review_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, feedback_text, rating FROM player_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%';
SELECT review_id, rating, review_text FROM game_reviews WHERE game_id = 456 ORDER BY rating ASC;
SELECT player_id, feedback_text, rating FROM player_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT player_id, feedback_text FROM player_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT player_id, feedback_text, rating FROM player_feedback WHERE player_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT player_id, SUM(rating) AS total_rating FROM player_feedback GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM player_feedback GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY total_feedback DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_feedback WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM player_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM player_feedback GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT AVG(rating_score) AS avg_rating_score FROM player_ratings;
SELECT player_id, MAX(review_score) AS highest_review_score FROM player_reviews GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM player_feedback WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM player_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 3;
SELECT player_id, AVG(review_score) AS avg_score FROM player_reviews GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, MAX(rating_score) AS max_rating FROM player_ratings WHERE rating_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM player_feedback JOIN player_reviews ON player_feedback.player_id = player_reviews.player_id;
SELECT * FROM player_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT id, player_id, rating FROM player_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT player_id, reward_name, reward_points FROM player_rewards WHERE reward_points >= 50 ORDER BY reward_points DESC;
SELECT player_id, review_text FROM player_reviews WHERE player_id = 10;
SELECT player_id, game_id, total_playtime FROM game_statistics WHERE game_id = 5 ORDER BY total_playtime DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) FROM player_reviews GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT player_id, SUM(total_playtime) AS total_playtime FROM game_statistics GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY total_playtime DESC;
SELECT player_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM player_feedback GROUP BY player_id HAVING AVG(rating) > 2;
SELECT player_id, reward_name, SUM(reward_points) AS total_points FROM player_rewards GROUP BY player_id, reward_name HAVING SUM(reward_points) > 50 ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_feedback
SELECT player_id, game_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM player_feedback WHERE player_id = 100
SELECT game_name, release_date, genre FROM games ORDER BY release_date DESC
SELECT player_name, email FROM players WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT player_id, game_id, rating FROM player_ratings LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM player_feedback WHERE player_id = 1001 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC
SELECT player_name, email FROM players WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT game_id, game_name, release_date FROM games WHERE genre = 'Action' AND platform = 'PC' LIMIT 10
SELECT feedback_id, player_id, feedback_text FROM player_feedback WHERE game_id = 2002 AND feedback_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30'
SELECT review_id, player_id, rating FROM player_reviews WHERE game_id = 1003 ORDER BY rating DESC, review_date ASC
